title: Watch The Official Trailer Anaarkali Of Aarah | Ft. Swara Bhaskar, Sanjay Mishra And Pankaj Tripathi
text: tweet After releasing the teaser and posters, the makers have released the official trailer of Swara Bhaskarâ€™s Anaarkali Of Aarah. The story of the film revolves the life of an erotic singer played by Swara, who fights back with a powerful man and rises against all the odds. Watch the trailer right here: Watch The Official Trailer Anaarkali Of Aarah | Ft.
